name: Guacamole
body:
### Halo Guacamole
Halo Guacamole is a Chat Server / Client implementation for Halo Online.
It uses sessionId changes to create server instances, with a host check to see if your a Client or not.

### Server You Say?
At the moment - its using IRC, but it has a direct connection UDP server / client fully implemented.
The only thing required to switch to that is finding the 

### Eldorado Class
The Eldorado class was stripped out of Coolranch, and has been modified extensively.
https://github.com/stgn/coolranch

### Eldorito
https://gitlab.com/Wunkolo/ElDorito/blob/master/README.md
